pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, December 14, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

Closed to media.                                                                         

Media appearance

9:00 p.m. A year-end interview with the Prime Minister will air on ICI RDI with Céline Galipeau.
